name: encumber
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to weigh someone or something down, or to make it difficult for someone to do something: be encumbered with/by Today, thankfully, women tennis players are not encumbered with/by long, heavy skirts and high-necked blouses. Synonym
constrain
